oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-10-13 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from October 13, 1956 (although disc label is dated October 12, 1956, this is likely incorrect). Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Jim Reeves (host/performer), guest performer Rose Maddox (her first appearance as an Opry member), and regular performers the Old Hickory Singers, Lew Childre, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jim Reeves; Old Hickory Singers; Rose Maddox; Lew Childre; Del Wood
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Jim Reeves -- According To My Heart (Jim Reeves -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Jim Reeves) -- Jim Reeves introduces the Old Hickory Singers -- Floatin' Down To Cotton Town (Old Hickory Singers) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Jim Reeves) -- Jim Reeves introduces Rose Maddox -- Paul Bunyan Love (Rose Maddox) -- Jim Reeves introduces Lew Childre -- Katy Hill (Lew Childre calls) -- Jim Reeves talks -- When God Dips His Love In My Heart (Jim Reeves) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Jim Reeves) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Jim Reeves introduces Del Wood -- Intermission At The Opry (Del Wood) [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Childre, Lew, 1901-1961; Old Hickory Singers; Reeves, Jim; Maddox, Rose
